name: Mighty Nerd
overview: Based on 1988 Winchell Chung/ISM Apple IIGS release, MIGHTY MARVEL VS THE FORCES OF E.V.I.L., in it the player chooses a superhero and their opponent. The player has a number of superhero skills including: running, leaping, swimming, punching, lifting, and throwing. Each character has their own unique skills as well. There are 4 different scenarios, and 5 possible heroes. The player can explore the bank, the city, underground tunnels, and maze. Game contains a manual addendum on disk 1 (see 'Readme.MightyNerd' text file), as well as a standalone superhero character editor.
